newsitem.title: USA: ThermoQuest in private stock placement.
newsitem.headline: ThermoQuest in private stock placement.

text.p: ThermoQuest Corp said Tuesday it has completed private placements of 1.77 million common shares at $15.0 per share, raising $25 million.
The proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, including possible acquisitions, the company said.
After the private placement, Thermo Instrument Systems Inc owns about 90 percent of ThermoQuest's outstanding shares, ThermoQuest said.
ThermoQuest makes mass spectrometers and liquid and gas chroomatographs used in analysis of chemical compounds.
